item.title: Dec-2025 Quarterly Earnings Reveal Mixed Market Sentiment with Select Sectoral Strength
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has delivered a nuanced picture across Indian equities, with 2,800 companies reporting results. While the overall proportion of companies posting positive results has inched up to 47.0%, mid-cap stocks continue to outperform their large- and small-cap counterparts, signalling a shift in market dynamics and sectoral performance. Time: 16 minutes ago

item.title: Are Dar Credit & Capital Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Dar Credit & Capital Ltd's latest results show a mixed performance, with a 40% increase in net profit and 25% growth in net sales, but concerns remain due to a low return on equity and high debt-to-equity ratio, indicating financial challenges ahead. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Carraro India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Carraro India Ltd's latest results show strong year-on-year growth with a net profit increase of 91.27% and revenue growth of 26.95%, despite a quarter-on-quarter decline. The company has improved its operating margin, indicating operational efficiency, but faces challenges in maintaining profitability amid fluctuating costs. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Garuda Construction and Engineering Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Garuda Construction and Engineering Ltd's Q3 FY26 results are strong, featuring a record net profit of ₹32.90 crores and a revenue of ₹140.02 crores, alongside a high operating margin of 32.22%. However, the company faces challenges with negative operating cash flow of ₹110 crores for FY25, despite its impressive market performance and return on equity of 22.24%. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Ecos (India) Mobility & Hospitality Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Ecos (India) Mobility & Hospitality Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a sequential decline in net sales and profit, raising concerns about sustainability, despite a strong year-on-year growth of 22.48% in revenue and a solid return on equity of 25%. Overall, the performance is mixed, indicating the need for careful monitoring of operational trends. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Globale Tessile Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Globale Tessile Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are poor, showing a net loss of ₹0.37 crores, a 5.82% revenue decline from the previous quarter, and a staggering 78.47% year-on-year drop, indicating significant operational challenges and ongoing financial distress. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are TBO Tek Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: TBO Tek Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth of 25.92% year-over-year, but declining operating margins and profit margins raise concerns about profitability sustainability. While the company maintains a solid market position and financial flexibility, ongoing margin pressures and high valuation multiples warrant careful monitoring. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Borosil Scientific Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Borosil Scientific Ltd's latest results show a net profit of ₹2.89 crores, indicating a recovery from previous losses, but year-on-year sales growth is limited at 3.81%, and operating margins have significantly contracted, raising concerns about operational efficiency and competitive positioning. Overall, while there is some improvement, the company faces ongoing challenges compared to its peers. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Yatra Online Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Yatra Online Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a year-on-year revenue growth of 9.16% to ₹256.82 crores, but a significant sequential decline of 26.80% and a net profit drop of 41.60% raise concerns about profitability and operational challenges. While the operating margin improved, the overall performance indicates mixed results that may affect investor confidence. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Entero Healthcare Solutions Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Entero Healthcare Solutions Ltd's latest results show strong revenue and profit growth, with net sales up 11.91% quarter-on-quarter and net profit increasing 13.67%. However, concerns about negative operating cash flow and modest return ratios suggest caution is needed regarding the company's financial health. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Platinum Industries Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Platinum Industries Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results are concerning, showing an 18.78% decline in net profit year-on-year and a 14.73% drop in revenue from the previous quarter, indicating ongoing operational challenges and margin compression. Overall, the company is facing significant headwinds that require close monitoring. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Inox India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Inox India Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results show strong revenue growth with net sales up 16.85% year-on-year, but net profit slightly declined sequentially, indicating margin pressures. Overall, the company demonstrates solid operational metrics and capital efficiency, despite some challenges in maintaining profitability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Nova Agritech Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Nova Agritech Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a 24.54% year-on-year decline in net sales and a 75.28% drop in net profit, indicating significant operational challenges and deteriorating financial performance. Investors should monitor future quarters for potential recovery or further decline. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Valiant Laboratories Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Valiant Laboratories Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth of 115.08% to ₹46.20 crores, but a severe decline in net profit by 89.01% to ₹0.20 crores, indicating significant profitability challenges and operational inefficiencies. Despite the revenue increase, the company's low margins and rising debt raise concerns about its long-term viability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Protean eGov Technologies Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Protean eGov Technologies Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a net profit decline of 5.70% sequentially and a revenue drop of 8.63%, raising concerns about profitability and operational stability despite a year-on-year revenue growth of 13.13%. The company's reliance on non-operating income and reduced institutional investor confidence indicate challenges ahead. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Concord Biotech Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Concord Biotech Ltd's latest results show revenue growth of 12.43% quarter-on-quarter and 13.74% year-on-year, but profitability has declined significantly, with net profit down 15.07% year-on-year and operating margins compressed, indicating ongoing operational challenges. Overall, the performance is mixed, with revenue growth not enough to offset declining profitability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Honasa Consumer Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Honasa Consumer Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results show strong year-on-year sales growth of 16.51% to ₹538.06 crores, but sequential declines in revenue and profit raise concerns about sustainability. While operational metrics have improved, ongoing challenges in the competitive landscape may impact future growth prospects. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are ARCL Organics Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: ARCL Organics Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are poor, showing a net loss of -₹8.81 crores and a 37.96% drop in net sales to ₹53.47 crores, indicating significant operational challenges and raising concerns about the company's future sustainability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Senco Gold Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Senco Gold Ltd's latest results show a significant year-on-year profit increase of 302.48% to ₹48.78 crores, but a concerning sequential decline of 53.39%. While revenue grew modestly by 2.37% year-on-year, it fell 15.89% quarter-on-quarter, indicating operational challenges that investors should monitor closely. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Divgi Torqtransfer Systems Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Divgi Torqtransfer Systems Ltd's latest results show strong revenue growth, with Q2 FY26 net sales up 15.75% sequentially and 53.76% year-on-year. However, concerns about margin compression, reliance on non-operating income, and declining return on equity suggest underlying operational challenges that stakeholders should consider. Time: 1 hour ago
